text: Frank "Bluey" Adams (12 June 1935 â€“ 11 August 2019) was an Australian rules football player. He played in the Victorian Football League (VFL) for the Melbourne Football Club from 1953 to 1964. Adams was born in Victoria, Australia. Adams died at the age of 84 on 11 August 2019 from cancer.
